title: Modern Jinan Stay near CBD with Two Onsite Restaurants & Fitness Centre
description:
Tucked away in Jinan’s western commercial centre, this contemporary retreat offers an elegant base with the city’s cultural heart nearby. Inside, savour everything from refined dining to generous buffet spreads, then step outside and you’re moments from iconic sites including Baotu Spring. Wander through charming old lanes, sample steaming bowls of jiaozi dumplings or relax by the tranquil waters of Daming Lake.

For a grand day trip, venture to Mount Taishan, a UNESCO World Heritage Site and sacred peak, and glide up by cable car for sweeping views. With Jinan West Railway Station just a short drive away, the region's wonders are always within easy reach.
offer_address: No 33 Sunshine New Road, Huaiyin District, Jinan  250022, China
